ingredients.item: 150g Waitrose LOVE Life Free From Gluten Penne Pasta
3 tbsp essential Waitrose Semi Skimmed Milk
Â½ x 25g pack fresh basil, torn

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender then drain.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the vegetables and pine nuts for 3-4 minutes. Add the tomato pesto, milk and basil and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Stir in the pasta, season and serve.
